title.rendered: The Ultimate Guide to Marketing Automation Terminology

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570735713024{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Your cheat sheet to demystifying marketing tech

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1507213424698{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]If you’re new to the marketing automation game, it can be easy to get overwhelmed by all the jargon.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”This free marketing automation guide covers:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1511279841099{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Marketing automation features and their uses
  • Commonly used industry terms
  • Essential marketing automation metrics
  • Bonus: Specific terminology for marketing agencies

[/vc_column_text]

What is marketing automation?
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1557453340040{padding-right: 5em !important;}” el_class=”xm-hide”]Marketing automation is technology that empowers marketers to drive more leads, close more sales and optimize their ROI. It further empowers marketing agencies to build higher-value relationships, increase monthly recurring revenue and prove ROI to clients.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”200px” el_class=”sm-hide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js]JTNDc2NyaXB0JTNFJTBBJTI0JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyOCUyOSU3QiUwQSUyMCUyNCUyOCUyMmlmcmFtZSUyMiUyOS5hdHRyJTI4JTIyc2Nyb2xsaW5nJTIyJTJDJTIwJTIybm8lMjIlMjklM0IlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMEElM0MlMkZzY3JpcHQlM0U=[/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
